item.description: We are a group of dynamic business owners and entrepreneurs who meet once a week to pass each other qualified referrals. We are a structured environment that helps individuals gain market growth in their perspective areas of business. We develop strong business relationships and operate on the Like, Know Trust principle. When you become a member of this group, you instantly gain your very own sales force that is looking for new business for you! Could you use more clients or more business? What are you waiting for...this is the group for you! ..
item.name: Methuen MA Business Builders
